result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam T. Fairchild

records.addlTxt:
10:48 AM Adam T. Fairchild appears in Court,  Atty Liesl E. Nelson, DA Halle E. Hatch for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CM4 and 22CM42 (STC). DA Hatch would like to set a STC in front of the Judge. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 10:52 am.
Status conference scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on December 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:33 PM Defendant Adam T. Fairchild appeared in custody  from Jail via video, Atty Liesl Nelson appears by phone, DA Halle Hatch appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin.  22CM4  DE does qualify for PD. Court questions non-appearance, he was having difficulties. Court will quash the warrants. DA Hatch is requesting a $250.00 Cash Bond w/current conditions continuing. Court will reinstate the bond in 22CM4. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:42 pm.
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 10:45 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Adam T. Fairchild
Current: 11740 Xion Blvd, Coon Rapids, MN 55433 United States  (Effective: 02-14-2022)
Prior: 452 Griffey Street, River Falls, WI 54022 
per DE in court. eif
of counsel Atty Liesl Nelson. eif

10:35 AM Attorney Liesl E. Nelson in Court.  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Nelson is unsure why Defendant is not present.  State requests Statewide warrant, noting Defenant is also in warrant status on other PC case and SCC case.  Court authorizes warrant.  Ajdourned at 10:36 AM
Status conference on April 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on March 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on February 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY
NO CONTACT WITH B.S.K. OR RESIDENCE UNTIL 72-HOUR NO CONTACT EXPIRES (JANUARY 11, 2022 AT 1:49 A.M.)  
AFTER THAT TIME THERE IS NO CONTACT OTHER THAN VIA PHONE FOR THE SOLE PURPOSE OF FACILITATING CHILD EXCHANGE.  CHILD EXCHANGE IS TO BE DONE THROUGH AN AGREED UPON THIRD PARTY.

03:14 PM Defendant Adam T. Fairchild appears via videoconferencing from PCJ with Attorney Liesl E. Nelson via phone.  Defendant Adam T. Fairchild in custody.  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court confirms Defendant received copy of Complaint.  Court reads charges and possible penalties.  Further reading waived.  Constitutional rights explained to Defendant.  Atty. Nelson enters NG pleas.  DA Hatch requests $10,000 signature bond w/conditions of AS and NC w/BSK or her residence.  Notes 72-hour no contact in effect until 01/11 at 1:49 a.m.  Atty. Nelson does not object to bond other than NC provision, noting that is his residence and children in common.  DA Hatch responds, noting 72-hour no contact as well.  Is willing for DE to have contact re: exchange of children, via phone.  Court orders bond.  Advises Defendant does not qualify for PD.  Court questions address, phone and dob.  Non-military.  Adjourned at 3:24 PM  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
